verses.text: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.context: Jesus Christ died for the sins of humanity, willingly offering to make a sacrifice to save the world

1.text: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
1.indonesian_translation: Karena begitu besar kasih Allah akan dunia ini, sehingga Ia telah mengaruniakan Anak-Nya yang tunggal, supaya setiap orang yang percaya kepada-Nya tidak binasa, melainkan beroleh hidup yang kekal

verses.text:
Let nothing
be done through strife or vainglory; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves.
verses.context: We ought to treat the needs of others as more important than our own, and other people as greater than us

2.text:
Let nothing
be done through strife or vainglory; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves.
2.indonesian_translation: Dengan tidak mencari kepentingan sendiri atau puji-pujian yang sia-sia. Sebaliknya hendaklah dengan rendah hati yang seorang menganggap yang lain lebih utama dari pada dirinya sendiri

verses.text: But fornication, and all uncleanness, or covetousness, let it not be once named among you, as becometh saints;
verses.context: sexual immorality and all impurity or covetousness must not even be named among you, as is proper among saints

3.text: But fornication, and all uncleanness, or covetousness, let it not be once named among you, as becometh saints;
3.indonesian_translation: Tetapi percabulan dan rupa-rupa kecemaran atau keserakahan disebut sajapun jangan di antara kamu, sebagaimana sepatutnya bagi orang-orang kudus

verses.text:
A
good name
is rather to be chosen than great riches,
and loving favour rather than silver and gold.
verses.context: it is virtuous to choose a good name above riches.

4.text:
A
good name
is rather to be chosen than great riches,
and loving favour rather than silver and gold.
4.indonesian_translation: Nama baik lebih berharga dari pada kekayaan besar, dan dikasihi orang lebih baik dari pada perak dan emas

verses.text:
But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make not provision for the flesh, to
fulfil the lusts
thereof.
verses.context: people need to change their way of life by living as Jesus would

5.text:
But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make not provision for the flesh, to
fulfil the lusts
thereof.
5.indonesian_translation: Tetapi marilah kita semua menjadikan Penguasa kita Kristus Yesus sebagai teladan hidup, supaya waktu orang melihat perbuatan kita, mereka seperti melihat Kristus dalam diri kita. Dan jangan pernah lagi berpikir untuk memuaskan keinginan-keinginan dari naluri kita yang berdosa.

verses.text:
Thus will I magnify myself, and sanctify myself; and I will be known in the eyes of many nations, and they shall know that I
am the LORD.
verses.context: a powerful declaration of God's sovereignty and power

6.text:
Thus will I magnify myself, and sanctify myself; and I will be known in the eyes of many nations, and they shall know that I
am the LORD.
6.indonesian_translation: Aku akan menunjukkan kebesaran-Ku dan kekudusan-Ku dan menyatakan diri-Ku di hadapan bangsa-bangsa yang banyak, dan mereka akan mengetahui bahwa Akulah TUHAN.

verses.text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel’s, the same shall save it.
verses.context: If you try to hang on to your life, you will lose it

7.text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel’s, the same shall save it.
7.indonesian_translation: Karena siapa yang mau menyelamatkan nyawanya, ia akan kehilangan nyawanya; tetapi barangsiapa kehilangan nyawanya karena Aku dan karena Injil, ia akan menyelamatkannya

verses.text: Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness shall be heard in the light; and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed upon the housetops.
verses.context: recognizing that God knows all things, even secrets

8.text: Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness shall be heard in the light; and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed upon the housetops.
8.indonesian_translation: Sebab yang kamu katakan di gelap, akan sembunyikan di angin; dan yang yang kamu katakan di telinga di kamar, akan dipuji di lapangan rumah

verses.text: Let no man say when he is tempted, I am tempted of God: for God cannot be tempted with evil, neither tempteth he any man:
verses.context: there is nothing in His nature that would consider or be attracted to evil

9.text: Let no man say when he is tempted, I am tempted of God: for God cannot be tempted with evil, neither tempteth he any man:
9.indonesian_translation: Janganlah seorang pun yang kena pencobaan berkata: 'Pencobaan ini datang dari Allah!' Sebab Allah tidak dapat dicobai oleh yang jahat, dan Ia sendiri tidak mencobai siapa pun

verses.text: For I determined not to know any thing among you, save Jesus Christ, and him crucified.
verses.context: Only those with God's Spirit can understand the truths revealed by God

10.text: For I determined not to know any thing among you, save Jesus Christ, and him crucified.
10.indonesian_translation: Sebab aku telah memutuskan untuk tidak mengetahui apa-apa di antara kamu selain Yesus Kristus, yaitu Dia yang disalibkan
